resources.string: need to get your for location
Your GPS seems to be disabled, do you want to enable it?
Please long press on the map anywhere\n for adding the center of the circle.
Please click on the green marker\n for adding the area radius.
Please click on the green marker again\n for changing the area radius.
Please enter radius in meters in the box below
You are now INSIDE the circle!
The position relative to the circle has changed to INSIDE
You are now OUTSIDE the circle!
The position relative to the circle has changed to OUTSIDE
